definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Lipoic Acid is a powerful anti-oxidant and helps protect the brain.
sentences.chinese: 硫辛酸是一种强有力的抗氧化剂有助于保护大脑。

sentences.english: I think it means re-booting your brain.
sentences.chinese: 我认为创新意味着重启你的大脑。

sentences.english: Why would exercise bulk up your brain?
sentences.chinese: 为什么锻炼会让大脑增大？

sentences.english: Objective To analyze CT features and reason of subdural hygroma beside cerebral falx.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析大脑镰旁硬膜下水瘤的CT表现和形成原因。

sentences.english: A typical quick temper, and work is rash, almost not pass through the brain.
sentences.chinese: 一个典型的急性子，做事也很鲁莽，几乎不经过大脑。

sentences.english: Eating fish overall is greatly beneficial to your health, especially that of your brain.
sentences.chinese: 吃鱼有益健康，特别是对您的大脑而言更是如此。

sentences.english: A special camera mounted on a boom is swung into position above Corina's frontal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 一个特殊的相机被安装在了科瑞娜大脑额叶的位置上。

sentences.english: Thoughts are visitors, who visit the central station of the mind.
sentences.chinese: 想法是来大脑中央站点串门的门客。

sentences.english: But at times, and especially at first, the brain does this work clumsily.
sentences.chinese: 但有时候，尤其是刚开始时，大脑并不擅长做这些。

sentences.english: The brain rests, then it becomes active, then dreaming occurs.
sentences.chinese: 大脑休息，然后它变得活跃，然后做梦发生。

sentences.english: Brain has already almost forgotten it, in a desperate paroxysm of self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 望的自我保护状态下，我的大脑已经将它忘记。

sentences.english: Taste buds react to sweet, sour, salty, and bitter. Messages are sent from the taste buds to the areas in the cortex responsible for processing taste.
sentences.chinese: 信号会从味蕾传送到大脑皮质中负责处理味觉的区域。

sentences.english: A third group of selected genes affects brain function.
sentences.chinese: 第三组被选者的基因影响大脑的功能。

sentences.english: Functional magnetic resonance imaging of activity in the subjects' brains hints at a possible explanation.
sentences.chinese: 受试者的大脑活动的核磁共振成像暗示着一个解释。

sentences.english: We will be able to actually measure the activity of the human brain.
sentences.chinese: 将来，我们还能够测量人类大脑的活动。

sentences.english: This is the part of the brain we use to weigh the pros and cons or engage our "expertise."
sentences.chinese: 这部分大脑用来权衡利弊或利用“经验”。

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
